JAname: ルミドゥースの哀悼歌

upgrade.0: ATK increased by 15%. When the equipping character triggers Burning on an opponent or deals Dendro DMG to Burning opponents, the DMG dealt is increased by 18%. This effect lasts for 8s, max 2 stacks. When 2 stacks are reached or when the duration of the 2nd stack is refreshed, restore 12 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 12s. The 2 aforementioned effects can be triggered even when the character is off-field.
upgrade.1: ATK increased by 19%. When the equipping character triggers Burning on an opponent or deals Dendro DMG to Burning opponents, the DMG dealt is increased by 23%. This effect lasts for 8s, max 2 stacks. When 2 stacks are reached or when the duration of the 2nd stack is refreshed, restore 13 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 12s. The 2 aforementioned effects can be triggered even when the character is off-field.
upgrade.2: ATK increased by 23%. When the equipping character triggers Burning on an opponent or deals Dendro DMG to Burning opponents, the DMG dealt is increased by 28%. This effect lasts for 8s, max 2 stacks. When 2 stacks are reached or when the duration of the 2nd stack is refreshed, restore 14 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 12s. The 2 aforementioned effects can be triggered even when the character is off-field.
upgrade.3: ATK increased by 27%. When the equipping character triggers Burning on an opponent or deals Dendro DMG to Burning opponents, the DMG dealt is increased by 33%. This effect lasts for 8s, max 2 stacks. When 2 stacks are reached or when the duration of the 2nd stack is refreshed, restore 15 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 12s. The 2 aforementioned effects can be triggered even when the character is off-field.
upgrade.4: ATK increased by 31%. When the equipping character triggers Burning on an opponent or deals Dendro DMG to Burning opponents, the DMG dealt is increased by 38%. This effect lasts for 8s, max 2 stacks. When 2 stacks are reached or when the duration of the 2nd stack is refreshed, restore 16 Energy. Energy can be restored this way once every 12s. The 2 aforementioned effects can be triggered even when the character is off-field.

upgrade.0: 攻击力提升15%；装备者对敌人触发燃烧反应或对处于燃烧状态下的敌人造成草元素伤害后，造成的伤害提高18%。该效果持续8秒，至多叠加2层；叠加至2层或2层的持续时间刷新时，恢复12点元素能量，每12秒至多通过这种方式恢复一次元素能量。上述2种效果角色处于队伍后台时也能触发。
upgrade.1: 攻击力提升19%；装备者对敌人触发燃烧反应或对处于燃烧状态下的敌人造成草元素伤害后，造成的伤害提高23%。该效果持续8秒，至多叠加2层；叠加至2层或2层的持续时间刷新时，恢复13点元素能量，每12秒至多通过这种方式恢复一次元素能量。上述2种效果角色处于队伍后台时也能触发。
upgrade.2: 攻击力提升23%；装备者对敌人触发燃烧反应或对处于燃烧状态下的敌人造成草元素伤害后，造成的伤害提高28%。该效果持续8秒，至多叠加2层；叠加至2层或2层的持续时间刷新时，恢复14点元素能量，每12秒至多通过这种方式恢复一次元素能量。上述2种效果角色处于队伍后台时也能触发。
upgrade.3: 攻击力提升27%；装备者对敌人触发燃烧反应或对处于燃烧状态下的敌人造成草元素伤害后，造成的伤害提高33%。该效果持续8秒，至多叠加2层；叠加至2层或2层的持续时间刷新时，恢复15点元素能量，每12秒至多通过这种方式恢复一次元素能量。上述2种效果角色处于队伍后台时也能触发。
upgrade.4: 攻击力提升31%；装备者对敌人触发燃烧反应或对处于燃烧状态下的敌人造成草元素伤害后，造成的伤害提高38%。该效果持续8秒，至多叠加2层；叠加至2层或2层的持续时间刷新时，恢复16点元素能量，每12秒至多通过这种方式恢复一次元素能量。上述2种效果角色处于队伍后台时也能触发。

upgrade.0: 攻撃力+15%。装備者が敵に燃焼反応を起こした後、または燃焼状態の敵に草元素ダメージを与えた後、与えるダメージ+18%。この効果の継続時間は8秒で、最大2層まで重ね掛け可能。2層まで重ねた時、または2層の継続時間がリセットされた時、元素エネルギーを12ポイント回復する。この方法による元素エネルギーの回復は、12秒毎に1回のみ可能。この二つの効果は、キャラクターが待機中でも発動可能。
